A company uses Microsoft 365.
Employees report that their searches are failing in Microsoft Outlook.
You need to determine the reason the searches are failing.
What are two possible ways to achieve this goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: B and D for sure

B. View the Exchange Online advisories in the Service health dashboard.
D. Submit a service request in Support Assistant.

The Exchange Online advisories in the Service health dashboard can provide information about known issues or outages affecting Outlook searches. Submitting a service request in Support Assistant can also help identify the issue and provide troubleshooting steps to resolve the issue. Viewing the mailboxes list in the Exchange admin center and viewing the email activity in the usage reports may not necessarily provide information about Outlook search issues.
Sure for B and D
D and B for sure.
